website_summaries.verdict: This is the perfect contact solution for those that wear monthly lenses or are looking for a way to keep infrequently worn lenses fresh.
pros: Unique contact solution that uses bubbling technology to thoroughly disinfect and refresh lenses, making them feel like new again
Can increase the lifespan of contacts with regular use given solution’s hefty disinfecting power
cons: Contacts must be left in solution for a minimum of 6 hours for cleansing to be effective

customer_reviews.title: Something's wrong with this batch
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this isn't the first time I purchase this product from amazon. I left lenses in case overnight. I actually didn't put on my lense until 1pm and it BURNS. the chemicals didn't react fully with the solution and it burns my eyes. It hurts terribly. I didn't do anything wrong. I definitely let it react for over 10 hours yet this happened. Something wrong with this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Jingyi Gao

customer_reviews.title: The Platinum Disc Wears Away and That Causes Big Problems
customer_reviews.text: I ended up in the emergency room with burning eyes when I discovered the Clear Care reactive disc does not last as long as the large container of solution. For me the result was that even after rinsing the lens olff with saline after a normal cleaning cycle I burned the hell out of my left eye. This is a very good product but I am not the first user to end up at hospital. The maker must warn people about the issues with he reactive disc. Even if still makes the solution bublle it does not mean it is working. My advice is replace the cleaning container half way through the solution bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Trento

customer_reviews.title: A twin pack that includes only one (1) lens case. I'm really not impressed. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is directly from the Amazon product listing: Clear Care Solution FAQs Q: When should I throw away my CLEAR CARE or CLEAR CARE PLUS Solution lens case? A: Always throw away your CLEAR CARE or CLEAR CARE PLUS Solution lens case with each new purchase of CLEAR CARE or CLEAR CARE PLUS Solution. A fresh lens case is included in each package of each solution. Always use the new lens case when you open a new package.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best contact lens solution I've used since I haven't experienced blurry contacts or random burning when putting them on. The only problem is that it doesn't really last because you have to use so much in the case compared to others. I've only been using it for one month and i'm almost done with one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: Something I wish I'd starting using YEARS ago!
customer_reviews.text: This just MADE MY DAY! I wear gas perms and the overpriced Boston solutions (just toss those in the trash!) have not been working well for me for some time. So glad I found this! What a breeze! Hello, clear day - with no eye-irritation whatsoever and so simple to use! Hooray! I wish I would've found this years ago. So - all of you gas-perm wearers out there - TRY THIS NOW. It's simply not true that you "can no longer wear contacts comfortably," as some people (including eye doctors) might tell you. You just need a proper enzymatic cleaner like this one to remove deposits. Yessssssssssss.
customer_reviews.author: A Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation in my eye
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly, even leaving the lenses in the solution for 7.5-8 hours, more than the recommended 6 hours. Although it was not required, I also rinsed the lenses off after removal from the vials, yet I still got a burning sensation in my eyes when I placed them in my eyes. I tried it once, got a burning sensation, so I stopped but tried a week or so later. Same effect. Dragged my feet on this issue for too long, so no refund available.
customer_reviews.author: William A Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Fake solution.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. This is definitely fake solution. Was odd when it only came with one contact case. You are not supposed to use one contact case for more than one bottle. Also the contact dry out very quickly which is not normal for this type of solution. Further purchases will come from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Tombley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and it has been absolutely one of the best things I have ever bought! I have worn contacts since 1993 and have tried numerous solutions over the years, there has been absolutely nothing that compares to Clear Care. Since using this product, I don't have the middle of the day blurry contacts from buildup or the excess protein from my eyes that collects on my lenses. This product cleans my lenses so well that there isn't any residue or buildup cared over from previous wear. Clear Care keeps monthly disposable lenses in day one condition. I can not imagine using any other product!
customer_reviews.author: Freebird

customer_reviews.title: amazing of course product speaks for itself
customer_reviews.text: if you want clear contacts like fresh contacts that feel like brand new the first time you opened it from the packaging, then you must use this solution. its a pain having to wait 6 hours sometimes but in the end its totally worth it.. it will even prolong contacts i noticed that are designed for say 2 weeks to months...im serious like 1-2 months more you can wear "2 week" disposables..i dont know if thats doctor recommended but this solution does the job of completly and thoroughly sanitizing your contacts...using the other solution good luck seeing through your contacts clearly...i would highly suggest just trying it out and seeing the difference yourselves
customer_reviews.author: Arnold lee

customer_reviews.title: This 2 bottle package is not right. It will burn our eyes.
customer_reviews.text: If you also got 2 bottles of liquid and one lens container, then the issue is exactly that this package must be shipped with 2 lens containers. One lens container per bottle of liquid. I talked to the company that makes this and was told that there is a metal in each lens container that interacts with the liquid. after one bottle is finished the second bottle then does not have enough of the metal in the lens container to neutralize the liquid. I hope amazon will stop selling this.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Worm

customer_reviews.title: This solution RUINED a $370 pair of my gas permeable hard lenses
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist recommended this product and gave me a sample. I used it a couple months until (completely by the directions ever time) the sample was gone. I purchased another bottle/case and when I used it my lenses burned my eyes. I called my doctor and was told to try soaking them again - same problem. My lenses were RUINED. I had no choice but to purchase a new set which set me back. I usually have a set for 5-6 years. I do not recommend this product. I have worn contacts for 45 years and have never had such a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: LDMullins

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes or those allergic to other types of solutions
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my doctor for sensitive eyes that react to other types of contact lens cleaners. I've been using it for years. Because it has to neutralize over a 6-hour period, once you put the contact lenses into the cleaning solution you can't put them back in your eyes until the process is complete or it will burn your eyes. This sounds a little freaky but the natural hydrogen peroxide reaction reduces the solution to a water pH by morning. Purchase price on Amazon has been better than elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Black Market?  If no stars were possible, I'd choose NO STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clear Care for years. Recently started purchasing it from Amazon. I immediately started having severe symptoms...burning, blood shot eyes, after leaving in solution 8-9 hours overnight. I have temporarily resolved the problem by soaking the lenses in a Saline Solution in the morning (1 hour) before wearing. It was so convenient purchasing through Amazon, but I won't do it again. We should all be getting refunds for this product!!!! HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: JDPOWELL

customer_reviews.title: Eye, eyes, eyes
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I damn near burned my eyeball out of my head!! I skimmed the directions- my fault. I used a regular contact case one night and not the one that came with the solution. WRONG WRONG WRONG!!!! You will go blind. Well after I struggled to RIP the contact from my eye, I sat down and full read the instructions. All better now and this stuff works!! Your lenses are squeaky clean. The little action bubbles go to work in the provided container. So what I do now is - use regular solution during the week and deep clean my lenses on the weekend with THIS stuff here. It works better for me this way.
customer_reviews.author: La Shawn Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my contacts the best, keeps them well-conditioned
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist recommended this because it cleans better and keeps my contacts well-moisturized. I have tried normal contact lens cleaners of all brands but this is the only one that works. I have allergies which dry out my eyes and can cause me to tear up and get gunky eyes but this solution helps. Like the instructions say, you need to let the solution neutralize for 6 hours so I don't recommend it unless you sleep enough or for short stints. Still, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Seevuplay

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is the real product or not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is the real product or not (because some products on Amazon are labeled as "real" but aren't) because they produced far less bubbles than the many samples of Clean Care solution I got at my optometrist. It's very weak and I'm not sure if they'll do a sufficient job with cleaning my contacts. Not sure if it's an old solution that was delivered to me or if it's fake but not I'm not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning solution is way too complicated. The instructions for use with RGP contacts are printed on the inside of the box, so it takes some effort to reveal them. This product requires SIX steps including a 6-hour soak. It took me a long time to figure out how to open the container to hold the lenses during the cleaning process. I threw this product out and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this about once a week to give my contacts a good cleaning. Make sure you give them a good overnight soaking and they feel brand new! I usually rinse them and soak them for a couple minutes in saline before I put them in. Definitely recommend this product but not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: The case will not neutralize both bottles of solution
customer_reviews.text: I tried to write a descriptive review about how I know that Alcon knows and generally doesn't care that their cases can't neutralize 2 12oz bottles of solution, but Amazon refused to post it, so I'm just going to leave it at that. They know, many people have complained, they aren't planning on making any changes. Either spend the extra money for a single bottle with a single case or buy a different product, otherwise you can injure your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you enjoy excruciating pain
customer_reviews.text: If you are interested in feeling the worst pain of ur life then buy this crap! The first time I used it I didn’t realize this was not multipurpose that my fault. I stored it in the container but then I rinsed it. Terrible so bad! Then I read the box I know big mistake. But then I used it as the instructions said left it in the case that was provided for about 8 hours and once again burned the hell out of my eyeball! This stuff is terrible! Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.author: Sita Kadetz

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for years - Ophthalmologist recommended it to me and I've been using it ever since. No more filmy deposits on the lenses, which is a big relief for me and my dry eyes, especially at night. Only cumbersome during travelling, where I usually just buy a $5 saline traveling solution from a drugstore but the difference is noticeable. I usually fill up the case about 75% to the line every night and I get a few days more use at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrance Lee

customer_reviews.title: 2 big bottles
customer_reviews.text: Mann idk it’s my first using it And I did not follow the instructions and I put the contacts right in after the solution and you’re not supposed to do that so please when y’all do by this rate the instructions don’t be a dummy like me and just stick your contacts in your eye after you took a bath solution because it will burn and tingle and that hurts but I highly recommend it because they really do clean your contact so you could literally watch the bubbles eat the dirt and nasty off your contacts so I highly highly very much highly recommend buying and that’s on PERIODT
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Jesus!
customer_reviews.text: Finally my contacts are super clean and comfortable! I used to use this brand years ago for a long time to clean my contacts and I think it worked quite well. Started wearing contacts again about a year ago and started with the newest version of this product with hydraglyde. It was horrible! It did nothing for the comfort and moisture of the lenses and I wanted to rip out my contacts halfway through the day. I’m so glad they still make the classic because it’s amazing and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Poodlelicious81

customer_reviews.title: neutralizing lens case no longer working
customer_reviews.text: I have found that over the past year or so that the lens case which contains the disk which is supposed to neutralize the peroxide overnight is no longer working very well after even as little as 7 uses. It is supposed to work for a full month, but it has NOT been, in many cases. And I HAVE allowed for well more than the prescribed 6 hours each night to work its magic. In the morning, i often find that the lenses still have stinging amounts of peroxide in them.
customer_reviews.author: mda77

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Only buy it if you can leave your contacts to disinfect for 6-8 hours a day/night. It makes your monthly last a really long time and works great! Just don’t get it on your finger when you’re rinsing a contact and then go to take another contact out of your eye. Bad mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvana Keesler

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes :(
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this product three different times now, and I use it as directed and when I go to put in my contacts after they have been sitting all night in the product and my contacts burn the sh*^% out of my eye balls. I've left it for 10 hours before and this still happens - I have to rinse my contacts in saline solution AFTER already cleaning them over night in this --- makes for more work and I never know if my eyes are in for it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when you wanna clean your lens, I mean, you SHOULD clean it every day. It comes with a little container to put your contact lens in. You only need to fill it to the line. One thing I would like to note is that please wait 6 hours or more before you take them out. I learn it the hard way and put it in whilst there were bubbles. My eyes were red for days. But yeah, it was my fault though. Anyways, recommend this product, just read all the instructions clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Jemimah Larionova

customer_reviews.title: Burning Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I am encountering the "stinging eye" syndrome. I have used the product in the past, but they must have changed their formula. I tried contacting their customer service, but was only able to leave a message. Based on the feedback by others, I do not expect much help from them. I will move on to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Two bottles of solution, only one lens case
customer_reviews.text: Clear Care works very well to keep contacts feeling like new. However, in this package, you receive two bottles of solution but only one case; manufacturer’s instructions are to replace the case each time you open a new bottle (I assume because the ring inside the case wears out a bit each time it activates the hydrogen peroxide solution). If this package contained a case for each bottle, it’d be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: this fluid is the best on the market. I work in heavy industry and constantly expose my contacts to aerosolized, microscopic particles of grit and dust. This solution makes my contacts clean and moist unlike any other, especially when combined with the Rinse + Go of the same brand. I also thoroughly appreciate the fact you don't have to rub your lenses before stowing them. Highly recommended. One note of advice, since this is hydrogen peroxide, use caution around any garments you don't want bleached!!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Clean Contacts
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for at least 10 years. I use monthly disposable contacts and these help keep them clean the whole time. I like seeing the bubbles forming when you first put your contacts in. You don't have to do much scrubbing because it does the work for you. Be careful not to put your contacts back into your eyes before the time stated on bottle. I made that mistake once and my eyes burned a lot and turned very red. I have a bottle of regular solution for if I plan to wear my contacts within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantis

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my lenses clean and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clear Care for about 25 years. It's far better than any other contact lens cleaner I used before, and have worn contacts now for over 60 years. Only issue I have is price, which has stayed constant, but the bottle size decreased. Oh well. Nothing to do about that but pay it. (I rinse lenses with plain tap water, not more Clear Care, to cut back on cost. Had 0 problems doing that for decades now.)
customer_reviews.author: Pheeps

customer_reviews.title: This stuff keeps my huge rgp's clean and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Now, if you don't follow the directions, you'll pay a price for trying to refit them to your eyes before the hydrogen peroxide has neutralized into plain old water. But I couldn't be more satisfied with a cleaning and reconditioning solution.. I've had double cornea transplants and with these RGP's I see 20/20 again and this disinfectant is perfect for them. These lens cost $150.00 a piece and I won't trust them to any other solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Solution works but the case is defective, use another company's case
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the warnings about the solution not transitioning to saline. The problem is not the solution itself though - it seems to be a defective case that comes with the solution. I used this solution with a lens case from a different manufacturer and never had an issue. As soon as I lost that case and switched to the one that came with the Clear Care product, the solution did not consistently become saline - even if left for 8 to 12 hours or more. If you have a case you're fine with now, throw away the one that comes with this product. If you need a case and the product, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: blb0124

customer_reviews.title: Love the subscription service
customer_reviews.text: Costco stopped carrying this style of Contact solution, instead only had the hydra glide solution. I’m assuming that the hydra glide is great for most people but for me it makes me feel like my eyeballs are on fire. The subscription on amazon works great! I get 2 new bottles every 3 months just at the perfect time when my bottles run out. I wish they still came with the travel size bottle in the pack too but I guess those need to be purchased independently. Overall Great price for a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Works, but slowly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it feels like the best disinfectant job with no chance of eye irritation since only saline is left after six hours. That's the only rub though, if you want to put your contacts back in earlier, there's not way to rush the six hour disinfection and peroxide destruction time. You could flush them out and be OK, but you'd be interrupting the procedure. Should extend the life of RGP lenses since you won't scratch them with this approach where as digital cleaning can.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your contacts like new
customer_reviews.text: Are use this solution two weeks into my monthly contacts. They keep the contacts feeling fresh and new helping to get maximum comfort from your contacts. I put them in the solution before bed let them sit overnight and in the morning you have a new contacts. Definitely worth it if you’re a contact wearer!
customer_reviews.author: Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but check the date when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and usually have a few bottles of backup in my closet. I just opened the last one I bought from Amazon a few months ago, and found it had expired last month. I checked the one I had to buy from Target, -and it's good for a year +. Check the date before you use!
customer_reviews.author: theredheadsaid

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this contact solution/process about a year ago. I never knew how dirty my contacts were! Yuck! I wear one month disposables, and protein, make up, etc. builds up on them. Normal saline helps, but this product deep cleans over night so they are like new in the morning! Do not put this solution directly into you eye it will burn! Careful with little ones or people who do not know the difference between this product and normal saline.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Battle scarred contact veteran says Hoo-ah to Clear Care!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clear Care for I'm thinking about 30 years or so. It used to be called Aosept, and I'm pretty sure it's the best thing out there. I always get comments from eye doctors that my eyes are incredibly healthy for someone that's worn contacts every day for as long as I have. I'm allergic to the Hydroglide variety of Clear Care, so if you've used that and didn't like it, try this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kay

customer_reviews.title: Deep Cleans, but be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, I think, but sometimes it burns the heck on my eyes. This is so tricky that I may just use this once a week and only after soaking for a day in regular saline. The upside is that it was the only thing that cleaned waterproof mascara off my lenses, which become cloudy at times.
customer_reviews.author: xanmom

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love how clean and easy it is to work with. Just pop up the levers and take your contacts with no hassle. I had to dig into my old contact case until I could grab the lenses, not with this! Love it! Only dislike is the solution has to sit for the time mentioned, or else your eyes will BURN if you apply the contacts before time. The solution bottle has a warning label -Don’t underestimate it!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice

customer_reviews.title: This version of clear care is DEFFECTIVE! Will destroy your contacts & countertop!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other types of this solutions such as Hydraglyde for over 20 years and ordered this triple action solution is an absolute nightmare! Its overactive and bubbles so much that the container overflows out to the counter completely and contacts are destroyed! It has to be RECALLED. Useless and defective. And manufacturers did not take any responsibility for it when I contacted them. DO NOT BUY THIS VERSION!!!
customer_reviews.author: Payam L.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR LONG TERM CONTACT WEARERS
customer_reviews.text: Even when I wear contacts for longer than I should, putting them in this solution for atleast 7 hours makes all the difference in the world. They feel like new contacts! Just be sure to NEVER touch your bare eyeball with the solution. It BURNS. Wash your hands. And I know it doesn't say it on the package but rinsing your contacts off with regular saline solution, before you put them back in your eyeball after they've sat in the Clear Care really helps take away any burn.
customer_reviews.author: Molly K Starin

customer_reviews.title: Only solution I have ever and will ever use.
customer_reviews.text: Only cleaner that I have used in the past ten years. My contacts go months before I feel like I should replace them and they “should” get replaced every month. Bit of advice: if you use one case for too many bottles instead of the new ones, it starts to wear down. This means putting burning contacts in your eye when you start your day.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: I had been using Renu and other good brand solutions for more than a decade
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user of this product. I had been using Renu and other good brand solutions for more than a decade. When I was looking for something new I came across this product. I wasn’t sure at first how to even use it. But after a few months use I am a fan of this product. It does make so much sense to use its own case. I gave it a 4 star because my lens have become uncomfortable these days (may be baecause of old lens or old solution). I want to use this solution again with my new lens and give more exact review. Other than that i am loving this clear care solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sajal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This solution will extend the life & comfort of your contact lenses. There are some reviews of this product burning your eyes but those people must be complete morons. The solution will only burn your eyes if you use it improperly & it is very very easy to use properly per the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Contacts feel newer for longer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this solution for years. I think it gets my contacts cleaner and makes them feel newer longer. The case that comes in the box has always lasted longer than both both bottles of solution. Just make sure you don’t screw the cap on too tight. I’ve found that a very tight cap does make it so your contacts have to sit in the solution for a bit longer than the bottle directs.
customer_reviews.author: OhSaySugar

customer_reviews.title: The best contact solution out there.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this contact solution for over 10 years with my Acuvue Oasis contacts. I had a lot of problems and couldn’t wear contacts until someone recommended this. Since then, I’ve been able to wear contacts without a problem. It removes buildup and helps comfort last longer. When I open my lenses I rinse them with a saline solution. Make sure you read the instructions on the bottle and never put it directly in your eye.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Neutralizer doesn’t last the two pack
customer_reviews.text: They only give you one neutralizer for two bottles - too bad it isn’t effective much past the first one. Oh well they gotta cut corners somehow 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: lingling

customer_reviews.title: A necessary change for long term contact wearers
customer_reviews.text: I have worn contacts now for almost 19 years and I was constantly having discomfort with saline solutions, and unable to wear them daily or even for more than a few hours. This is definitely the solution. They feel clean, my eyes are no longer irritated, and I can wear them daily all day again. So glad I switched to peroxide solution over saline, I will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Justice

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: ruined 2 sets of my 2 week contacts. If not perfectly placed the lens gets trapped in the door and causes little lips on the edges. Also makes them very sticky (to them selfs) after taking out. But from solution to eye it is amazing. So I will try to perfect it
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Best contact solution, as long as you are careful.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, never had any issues other than when i was an idiot. ONLY USE THE CONTAINER THAT COMES IN THE KIT. Don't mix solutions. Change the container as often as you get a new one with the kit, or when there isn't enough of a reaction with the (bubbly thing). Fair warning, a bit of un-activated peroxide will burn something fierce, so ALWAYS check for a good amount of bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cleans contacts better than regular solutions but absolutely must wait the full 6 hrs. Solution does not last more than about 30 days after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of value for 32 ounces...superp product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was getting ready to buy this through some other venue so I asked to shop around. This is an excellent buy for a superp product. Just remember...you might want to keep a small bottle for travel 'cause you're getting 2 16 ounce bottles in this deal!
customer_reviews.author: hickory rock

customer_reviews.title: Whooo science!!! Works amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!! Cleans my lenses and leaves them feeling like new. Caution, it does bubble a lot if you’re not careful. Try not to move or shake the container after filled and closed. I put a cloth under it in case it does leak when bubbling. Also, as mentioned by others, be sure you allow enough time for the solution to neutralize before putting your contacts in the next day. I usually let it sit around 7 hours with not burning or issues. Great product, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Garcia. E

customer_reviews.title: Neutralizer stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used the product for a week, maybe ten days, and the neutralizing disk stopped neutralizing the solution and contact lenses. Burned my eye as a result. Twice. That's because I thought I'd done something wrong the first time. It would be a good product if the risk of burning your eyes was closer to zero.
customer_reviews.author: three pups

customer_reviews.title: Sclarel lenses
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product every night for years now. I don't know what to say except I've never had an eye infection and it's never damaged my sclarel lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this on my gps lenses I was quite surprised at how well it cleaned them. Not at all difficult to use...daily or weekly. Bottles are a bit large for travel - but I think they sell smaller ones for that use. I am very satisfied with this hydrogen peroxide cleaning system.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand for years and love it! True, you can’t spray it into your eyes and you have to wait 6 hours for it to neutralize in the eye cup but it cleans great and seems a bit more natural then other options. No irritation when used correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily.
customer_reviews.text: Works a lot better than renu or biowash. My lenses are clean every day and my eyes feel better than the cultivate solution. However make sure to wait at least 6 hours before putting them back in your eyes. It will burn otherwise. Also do NOT use as a rinse. That is where the multi use brands are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, have a back up if you don't have time to let the reaction complete
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work much better than renu, and a little better than optifree. I keep other solutions just in case I don't have 7 hours to let them sit. I put them in too early ONCE, burning is an under statement. My eyes looked so bloodshot.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Bones

customer_reviews.title: made my eyes burn
customer_reviews.text: after the first night of my contacts swimming in this solution, I went to put them in the next morning. Before I could even get my contact lenses in both eyes, my eye started burning like never before! It was terrifying! Threw both bottles of the solution out immediately. My eyes aren't even that sensitive - I do well with slightly higher-end contact lens solution brands. I can't imagine what is going on with this stuff or why it set my eye on fire, but I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Clear Care keeps you contacts clean and disinfected during the day.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every night and have for many years. You just need to know, once you put your contacts in the container to clean you must wait 8 hours before able to insert into your eye. I do really like and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: NAL

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lens cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lens cleaner. My eye doc recommended. I use normal solution 5 days and week and the hydroxy cleaner twice a week. As someone with allergies, this deep clean has greatly improved my clarity of vision. I haven't had to use my allergy prescription eye drops since I began use. Make sure that they sit in this solution AT LEAST 6 hours before putting the lens back in your eyes. IF you do put lens back in your eyes straight out of the solution prior to the 6 hours, your eyes will burn like you wouldn't believe.
customer_reviews.author: ekphotogirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great but degrades over time.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and seems to keep my lenses very clean. It does seem to lose power (not so many bubbles) as you work your way through each bottle. You also can't use it to rinse off your lenses so I still have to keep another cleaner on hand for those times I drop my lenses when applying. Still prefer this over my other brands, though.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: No scratches from rubbing to clean hard lenses!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for hard lenses! No rubbing means no scratches. Change the case with each new bottle so it bubbles a lot, wish the double bottles had two cases. I also rinse with plain water and use conditioning drops to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Burns even after 6 hrs
customer_reviews.text: It says after 6 hours the peroxide would be neutral.so tell me why I had mine in them for over 24 hrs and it still burned my eyes..very bad..and these were brand new contacts so
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great system for Contacts
customer_reviews.text: Since going to my eye doctor this year. She has me on this Clear Care System for my Contacts. I really like it. My contacts seem cleaner. I don't know for sure but the feel better on my eyes. I've subscribed now so we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but I will never purchase it from Amazon again. They must have purchased a faulty batch for cheap. The case doesn't work properly. Make the trip to Walmart to purchase one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER. Must have in my bathroom cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear monthly contacts and they used to start to feel dry and... dirty after 2 weeks, but after I started using this every day, they feel great until I change them out. I soak my contacts in this solution in the case provided overnight and every morning my contacts feel brand new!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Great contact lens cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to clean your contacts with. The price is good and free repeat delivery if you want it. The 12 ounce bottle is a little big for traveling but smaller sizes can be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: noel rauch

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for contact lenses
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective contact lens cleaning solution I've ever dealt with. No rubbing the lens at all. I really like it, but it's kind of pricy. I buy a knock-off on Walmart for around $6 less.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Gets my soft lenses noticeably cleaner and more comfortable than anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Without this product I would not be able to wear a pair of contact lenses for more than about 3 days. I am an experienced lens wearer, and quite tolerant of discomfort and a little blurring. But my eyes are now a little dry, and the other cleaning+disinfecting method doesn't get my lenses clean enough. Ditto for the direct competitors to Clear Care. My ophthalmologist refers to this brand as "the gold standard" in soft lens care.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: This contact solution is worth every penny. It extends ...
customer_reviews.text: This contact solution is worth every penny. It extends the life of my contacts, which feel clean and hydrated in the morning, and requires no scrubbing. My only complaint is that the case has a tendency to leak the solution out if it gets knocked over, making it a pain for traveling or houses with rude cats or children.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than any store purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can do a subscription basis because if you wear contacts there's no way you're not going to have to buy this. Also, this eye solution is great if your eyes dry out by the end of the day like mine. Consult your optometrist first though, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Thia item is great! I use RGP lenses, and before this product I was using the Bosch cleaning solution and Conditioning Solution. I always had an issue of dirty lenses no matter how many times I cleaned them. My eye doctor said I should use this solution instead as it will not wear down the contacts like the other solutions. Since switching (about a month ago) I have no longer had any issues and it saves me about $40 a month! So glad I switched!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Description was that it would remove grime and build up. My contacts like to get gunk on them from my makeup. I followed the instructions and when I woke up this morning to clean and put them in, there was still all the gunk on them that I have to rub off every night. Product said you do not have to "rub/scrub" contacts, yet I still had to. Made it easier to get off, but defeated the purpose...
customer_reviews.author: Katiee Comer

customer_reviews.title: Works good to clean contact lenses
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but only had 1 dome lens holder instead of the two it was suppose to have. I've tried to travel with it..it got taken from me by TSA. It was too big of bottle for one and since it had a red cap..it couldn't be in carryon..which sucked because I didn't have luggage to put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Bowl

customer_reviews.title: Love product - needs more cases
customer_reviews.text: Been buying and using for years. Wish it came with multiple cases. One never truly last two full bottles. Towards end of bottle two it takes longer to neutralize the solution. I’ve burnt my eyes many times.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Watson XR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution to perfect your contact lenses
customer_reviews.text: After putting into the solution , use another light contact lens solution to avoid burning and itching of your eyes as this is concentrated but it really does the job to remove all the impurities from your contact lens.
customer_reviews.author: Nabiha

customer_reviews.title: Needs Larger Warning Label!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it was regular all in one solution and used in my regular flat cases. I’ve seen it on store shelves next to regular saline solution and decided to purchase online when I ran out of my past solution. Not realizing this had to be used with the case provided, I severely burned my eye yesterday and am still in pain. They need to make larger warning labels for new users !!!
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: My go-to solution for years
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and this works great. The activation with bubbles makes me feel like my contacts get a great clean each night. You have to be mindful that they sit in the solution for the time stated, 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever!! Burned my eyes horribly! Couldn’t even use!! I followed the confusing instructions!
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Burns despite sitting for almost 12 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I left my new contacts in as described at 9pm. It's 8:20am the next morning and when I attempted to put it in, my eyes were burning and turned red too. Definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RyuketsuYoru

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The solution is good no problem there, but I think they may have been a return item, cause on two orders both the contact viles would not fizz when placed in the solution. This happens when the vile is used too much. I used my original vile, still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: rjones

customer_reviews.title: Saved my contacts!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I accidentally dried out my contacts and I soaked them in contact solution and then cleaned/soaked them with this solution and they’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Daveline

customer_reviews.title: Best ever product for my eyeballs!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product!. I don’t care for the newer version with additives. It makes gunk in my eye. The plain product doesn’t irritate my eyes and I can wear my contacts for hours without irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Island Bound

customer_reviews.title: Always bought
customer_reviews.text: Choose this product for a long time to wash contact lenses, has only bought this brand, feel that the cleaning strength is better than other brands, today happy to write the evaluation.If there is a good discount period, continue to buy ~
customer_reviews.author: goodbyesorrow

customer_reviews.title: New contacts everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It cleans my contacts very well and leaves me feeling like I’m putting in new contacts every day. Definitely follow the instructions though, if you don’t you can sting the hell out of your eye!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff made and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: If you’re the type of wearer that contacts cloud up, this is for you. Regular cleaners don’t work for my type of eyes. This stuff cleans amazingly well. I’ve had no issues with tears or breaking down of contacts. Just follow the directions and you won’t have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist gave me a sample size of this a year ago and I haven't been able to go back to anything else for my overnight contact soak.If I'm taking a nap I'll soak them in something else but this solution seems to clean and sanitize them so well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone else who wears contacts
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Two months solution... one month cleaning bottle??
customer_reviews.text: Solution of two bottles was excessive in relation to the contact cleaning receptival. One month bottle with two months of solution??? I cancelled the “ delivery subscription”. Went back to Sams
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Only kind of contact solution I will use. I have been wearing contacts for 15 years. It cleans them amazingly well. I am able to use my contacts longer because they stay so clean
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Horstman

customer_reviews.title: Product is awesome,  packaging was damaged when opened
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say since this is an item I use daily, but the package arrived damaged-obviously not from shipping since another item arrived in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff a staple I can't live without - subscribe and save buys you more time to live life
customer_reviews.text: Same as what you get at any of the big stores. Cleans your contacts amazingly well. Best part is that I love that this staple comes to my home rather than wasting my day driving around to pick it up at a box store. Thank you Amazon for giving me more time to spend doing yoga and sipping lattes with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with itching
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and I will continue to repurchase. My allergies are really severe and this has helped alleviate eye itching.
customer_reviews.author: Senpaitiff

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product if you care about your eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: The label says let soak overnight or for at least 6 hours for the solution to neutralize . I always let my contacts soak overnight, which is anywhere from 8-12 hours because I take them off in the evening when I get home. It’s happened twice now that I go to put on my contacts and the solution is still “active” and it burns the hell out of my eye. It’s such a frustrating thing to happen first thing in the morning, I wouldn’t recommend this product, gets a 1 star only because I can’t give it a 0.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This contact lens solution is really useful. It's the first time I use this sort of solution. For this, I don't need to wash my contact lens everyday. Just put it into the little blue box and pure the lens. Easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Only one case
customer_reviews.text: I am used to getting my solution from Sam's Club, but I recently moved away from one. So I decided it didn't matter where I got my solution from. Super disappointed to find only one case in this set of 2 bottles of solution. I find it doesn't neutralize the solution very well by the end of the 2nd bottle. Will order from Sam's Club next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pett Family

product_meta.title: Clear Care Cleaning & Disinfecting Solution with Lens Case, Twin Pack, 12-Ounces Each, 12 Fl. Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Clear Care with lens case is ideal for anyone looking for a daily cleaning and disinfecting solution for contact lenses. Clear Care is the #1 doctor recommended hydrogen peroxide solution on the market. The exclusive Triple Action Cleaning formula and unique case, provides the perfect clean for sensitive eyes. This gentle saline solution offers a complete neutralization of peroxide which imitates natural tears. Clear Care uses hydrogen peroxide to kill harmful germs and bacteria that can be found on contact lenses, helping prevent eye infections. The cleaning and disinfecting process allows the solution to penetrate the lens to provide a deep clean, while the bubbling action helps to remove protein deposits and other foreign materials. Let the lens soak for 6 hours or overnight to allow the peroxide to neutralize and help avoid eye irritation when inserting the contact lenses. Clear Care is preservative-free, which means no chemicals will touch the eyes and cause irritation. Store the lenses in an unopened Clear Care lens case for up to 7 days and discard the old solution before using again. After the lens has been cleaned, make sure to get rid of all excess solution that is left in the case. Clear Care can be used with both soft and rigid (RGP) lenses. Clear Care’s vision is to be the most trusted leader in eye care and looks forward to continuing the trend of bringing the best new contact solutions and rinses to their patients around the world. Never reuse this solution
feature_bullets: Clear Care uses the bubbling power of hydrogen peroxide to make your lenses so fresh, they feel like new
Powerful Triple Action Cleaning loosens dirt, deep cleans and removes protein
Exclusive lens case features a platinum disc which activates our gentle, bubbling action and neutralizes our hydrogen peroxide into a gentle saline solution
Never put Clear Care Solution directly in or around your eyes. Follow instructions completely and do not skip any steps
Safe for all Soft and Rigid Gas Permeable Contact Lenses

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
